DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Finnegan Neonatal Abstinence Score Tool Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Having to do with children._A standardized scoring tool designed to assess opioid withdrawal in a newborn. It is used by well-trained healthcare professionals and enables the practitioner to make an assessment, identify the withdrawal symptoms, document the infants withdrawal, and initiate the appropriate treatment regimen, when needed._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
